main.docTitle: Trade Descriptions (Provision of Information on Regulated Electronic Products) Order

subsection.leadIn: In this Order, unless the context otherwise requires—

def.name: DigitalAudioPlayer
def.leadIn: digital audio player (數碼音響播放器)—

paragraph.name: a
b
paragraph.content: includes the product commonly known as MP3 player; and

paragraph.name: c

subsection.def: digital camcorder (數碼攝錄機) means any portable device the principal function of which is to make a recording in digital format on any medium from which a moving image may by any means be reproduced; (L.N. 169 of 2008)

digital camera (數碼相機) means any portable device the principal function of which is to record and store an image in digital format on any medium from which a still image may by any means be reproduced; (L.N. 169 of 2008)

def.name: MobilePhone
def.leadIn: mobile phone (手提電話) means any portable device the principal function of which is for mobile communication through a cellular radio network with—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: standard voice function of a telephone; and (L.N. 169 of 2008)

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: interconnection to the public switched telephone network (PSTN);

def.name: PortableMultimediaPlayer
def.leadIn: portable multimedia player (便攜式多媒體播放器)—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: means any portable device the principal function of which is to play digital multimedia files in one or more media recording formats from any storage medium;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: includes the product commonly known as MP4 player; and

paragraph.name: c

def.name: RegulatedElectronicProduct
def.leadIn: regulated electronic product (受規管電子產品) means—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: digital audio player;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: digital camcorder;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: digital camera;

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: mobile phone; or

paragraph.name: e
paragraph.content: portable multimedia player.

subsection.leadIn: In determining the principal function of a product for the purposes of this section, regard shall be had to—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the description applied to the product on its package;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the description applied to the product in any document relating to the supply of the product; (L.N. 169 of 2008)

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: the description applied to the product in any promotional material and advertisement concerning the product; and (L.N. 169 of 2008)

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: any other relevant information. (L.N. 169 of 2008)

section.name: s3
section.heading: Supply to be accompanied by written particulars

subsection.content: Any person who supplies any regulated electronic product in the course of trade or business at retail level shall, at the time of supply, issue an invoice or receipt to the person to whom the product is supplied.

subsection.name: 1A
subsection.content: Subsection (1) applies only to trade or business conducted on premises being a tenement included in the valuation list in force under section 14 of the Rating Ordinance (Cap. 116). (L.N. 169 of 2008)

subsection.leadIn: An invoice or receipt issued under subsection (1) shall contain—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the full name and address of the supplier;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the price at which the product is supplied;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: the date of supply;

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: the brand name of the product;

paragraph.name: e
paragraph.content: the model number of the product (if any);

paragraph.name: f
paragraph.leadIn: the following information as regards service for the inspection, repair or maintenance of the product—

subparagraph.name: i
subparagraph.content: such service is available free of charge or such service is not so available, as may be applicable; and

subparagraph.name: A
subparagraph.content: subject to subsection (3), the place at which such service is available;

subparagraph.name: B
subparagraph.content: the identity of the provider of such service; and

subparagraph.name: C

paragraph.name: g
paragraph.content: the place of manufacture of the product or, where the place of manufacture is unknown to the supplier, a statement that the place of manufacture is unknown; and

paragraph.name: h
paragraph.content: the information prescribed in relation to the product in column 2 of the Schedule.

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of subsection (2)(f)(ii)(A), where a service for the inspection, repair or maintenance of a product is available in more than one place, an invoice or receipt issued under subsection (2) shall at least— (L.N. 169 of 2008)

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: where the supplier has made a representation to the purchaser that such service is available in any particular one of those places, contain information on that place;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.leadIn: where the supplier has not made any representation to the purchaser that such service is available in a particular place, contain information on the place— (L.N. 169 of 2008)

subparagraph.name: i
ii
subparagraph.content: in which such service is available. (L.N. 169 of 2008)

section.name: s4
section.heading: Supplier shall retain invoice or receipt for 3 years

subsection.content: A supplier shall retain a copy of an invoice or receipt issued by him under section 3 for a period of not less than 3 years after the date of issue.
Any person who contravenes subsection (1) commits an offence and is liable on conviction to a fine at level 2 and imprisonment for 1 month.

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of this Order, where a regulated electronic product is sold by auction—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the auctioneer shall be regarded as the supplier of the product; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: it shall, in the absence of evidence to the contrary, be presumed to be supplied in the course of trade or business at retail level.

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of this Order, where a regulated electronic product is offered for sale by auction, it shall—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: be regarded as being offered for supply by the auctioneer; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: in the absence of evidence to the contrary, be presumed to be offered for supply in the course of trade or business at retail level.
